features.title: Features & audio
features.q1: How does the sleep timer work?
features.a1: Set a timer (15-120 minutes) and the audio will gently fade out over 3 seconds when it ends — no sudden stops.
features.a2: Yes. Once you've played sounds, they're cached for offline playback. Great for flights or low-connectivity areas.
features.a3: We offer 213+ high-quality audio files across 9 categories: Rain, Water, Animal Sounds, Hypnosis, Meditation, Fire, Singing Bowls, Chakra, and Subconscious Therapy.

technical.title: Technical
technical.q1: Do I need to create an account?
